title: 136: Love Is Blind Recap: Episode 4 ("Making Love" and Meeting The Others)
itunes:title: 136: Love Is Blind Recap: Episode 4 ("Making Love" and Meeting The Others)
description:
The Broads are back to recapping LOVE IS BLIND Episode 4 but first they chat about what’s going in their lives during quarantine and some Bachelor news! Then it’s time to talk about the morning after’s with all these LIB couples and the extreme differences being seen! Then BLESS THE NETFLIX GODS the couples are brought together and shit is about to go down.
***Reminder: we are watching this show episode by episode as we recap - though the show has been out for a long time, we do not know how anything ends so please no *SPOILERS*. Theses are our in real time takes:)
INSTAGRAM:
Chatty Broads: @chattybroads
Bekah: @bekah
Jess: @thebaddmom
